sn35.131:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying in the land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill, in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā’s Wood.
sn35.131:1.2: Then the householder Nakula’s father went up to the Buddha … and asked him,
sn35.131:1.3: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings aren’t fully extinguished in the present life?
sn35.131:1.4: What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings are fully extinguished in the present life?” …
